name: Polygon Drum
description:
Polygon Drum

Small Rhythm game made for the 20" game jam as a prototype for a bigger/longer version

Click on the big polygons as the notes get to the central compass to score points.

Miss notes to lose points

¡Just 20" to play, stay focused!
